Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory287.png'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 3: 'You input the data on the Ascendants into the Spear of F.O.S., this time generating the projections of Alpha and Luna.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'What are they doing here?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "We're approaching the Ascendants' base. It's not that surprising to see their projections.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Next up probably won't be their projections—but the real deal.", 4: '3'}
{2: "Let's go check it out.", 3: '19'}
{2: 'Who knows, we might be able to collect intel.', 3: '20'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The four of you quickly approach the projections of Luna and Alpha. Had you not known who they are, you would have assumed they are two ordinary sisters going for a walk.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "You're finally by my side, Sis.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She smiles at the other projection, but the latter remains silent.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Do you want to know why I became an Ascendant?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'In the beginning, I just wanted to live.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'But in order to see you again, in order to survive, something changed.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'They only saw me as a threat that needed to be destroyed...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "Once I was labeled a threat, it wasn't so easy to live. It came at a cost. Wasn't that the same for you, Sis?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Hearing this question, Alpha stares at the palm of her hand in disgust, then clenches her fist as if to crush something.'}
{3: 'Lucia frequently makes this gesture, but she is far more gentle as if to hold onto something precious.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Do you want to go back?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'I would still have some foolish hope had that never happened.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'What happened?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'This is where... they...', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory1.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory287.png'}
{1: '1', 3: 'With an expression of disgust, Alpha reaches out to the distant sun. This resembles the same action Lucia did before, but it is fundamentally different.'}
{3: "Unwilling to recall the memory, she furrows her eyebrows and disappears into the distance with Luna's projection."}
{1: '1', 3: 'The four of you follow them for a short distance until you see the projection of Lucia: Lotus among them.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "So I really did... I've been here before just like everyone else.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Time and war have ravaged this area, dealing irreparable damage to the land. However, a sense of familiarity still remains to give the three of them a sense of nostalgia.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'If this was where my suppressed memory took place...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Want to have a look?', 3: '67'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory287.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: 'I would still have some foolish hope had that never happened.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory287.png'}
{1: '1', 3: "Recalling Alpha's words, Lucia is silent for a moment."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I'm really grateful to be with everyone.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Even if this grateful feeling, according to the other me, comes from my ignorance of the truth.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "But now, no matter what I was born to do, I'm sure your conviction and tenderness would steer me once again in the right direction.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "...Yes, I'm sure of it.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She reaffirms herself quietly.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Before the gap in my memory, I was a member of the previous Gray Raven team. That was before the three of you were a part of the Gray Ravens.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Even without Luna by my side, I was still committed to fighting for Babylonia, for humans and my friends, just like I am now.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "But something happened during that gap in my memory, causing Alpha to walk down the path she's on.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "That's why... I can't give you my promise—I can't imagine what will happen after I remember.", 4: '1'}
{2: "But the Lucia I know doesn't like to run away.", 3: '86'}
{2: 'Also, I told you.', 3: '88'}
{2: 'No matter what happens, I respect your decision.', 3: '90'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: '...Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She looks up, her smile returned.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Then let's get going. Let's go see what happened to me.", 4: '1'}
